name: Reach For The Sky (GGEntertainmentTeam)
description:
Game made for Epic Mega Jam 2022.

Still in prototype phase.

Description:

Reach for the sky is an adventure game set on a mysterious island where anything is possible. Solve puzzles while moving to the heavenly world and have a real impact on what happens on the island.

Controls:

WSAD - Movement

F - Interaction

T - Teleport

LSHIFT - Run

SPACE - Jump

ESCAPE/P - Pause Menu

NOTE:

Unreal Engine packaged application may not be recognized by the antivirus and therefore a warning about an application of unknown origin may occur during startup.
